message:
http://renewa.co.za/

They seem to be concentrating on the forum / online community angle now.
(And I have no idea why that message went up in a proportional font.)

I noticed that recently, wonder where they'll be going with that. 

And I think the font comes up like that when you paste the link from somewhere. At least, it did it with me once before...
Yeah, it could be that it started as a small aside, and might be steadily growing into something bigger. And if one  can make some money on the side with advertising while doing so, even better...

Back on topic:  Look, it's conceivable that our friends the Take 2 founders now have enough, um, financial security that running this Renewa thing might be purely a hobby?

(Though they do seem to be selling advertising space quite actively.  I have no idea how much money there is in that.)
Weird.  I pasted the URL but then typed the rest of the message.
I've discovered that the font seems to do that if you accidentally include a leading new-line in your post.
